metadata.title: CVE-2024-44185 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
security update

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44185` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-bin - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.46.1-0ubuntu0.24.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
